Minimum transaction amount: Rs.500.
The offer is valid once per card/user per month.
The offer is valid only on Private Bus bookings and not applicable on Government SRTC bookings.
This offer cannot be combined with any other promotion.
Offer valid on all days of the week except Thursday and Friday."
